nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构，由中国共产党中央委员会全体会议选举产生。在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间，行使中央委员会的职权。
description.en: The central leadership body of the Communist Party of China, elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee. It exercises the powers of the Central Committee between its plenary sessions.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关，由党的全国代表大会选举产生。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China, elected by the National Congress of the party.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局的常设机构，是中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高领导层。
description.en: The standing committee of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, which is the top leadership of the CPC and the PRC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The working body of the Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局常委，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, currently serving as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局常委，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, currently serving as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局常委，现任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, currently serving as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局常委，现任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, currently serving as Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局常委，现任中共中央书记处排名第一的书记、中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, currently serving as the first-ranking secretary of the CPC Central Secretariat and Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局常委，现任中华人民共和国国务院副总理（排名第一）。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, currently serving as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局常委，现任中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, currently serving as Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共新疆维吾尔自治区党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as the Party Secretary of the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共北京市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as Head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共中央组织部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as Head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共中央宣传部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as a Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A Chinese military figure, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as a Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共中央政法委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共上海市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共天津市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，第二十届中共中央政治局委员，现任中共广东省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, a member of the 20th Politburo, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Guangdong.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military leading organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第五次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第五次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于1927年5月举行的全国代表大会，在此次大会后的五届一中全会上首次设立了中央政治局。
description.en: The National Congress of the Communist Party of China held in May 1927, after which the Central Politburo was first established at the 1st Plenary Session of the 5th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国务院总理。在六四事件后被免去党内外一切领导职务。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the CPC and Premier of the State Council. He was purged from all leadership positions after the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的政治事件，对中国政坛产生深远影响。
description.en: A political event that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing in 1989, which had a profound impact on Chinese politics.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委，在六四事件后被免职。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and was dismissed from his post after the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，期间大批党政军领导干部被打倒。
description.en: A political movement launched and led by Mao Zedong from 1966 to 1976, during which a large number of party, government, and military leaders were purged.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员，在文化大革命初期被打倒。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo and was purged in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记，后因薄熙来事件被免职并判刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo and Party Secretary of Chongqing, later dismissed and imprisoned due to the Bo Xilai incident.

description.zh-cn: 2012年发生的一系列导致时任中共中央政治局委员薄熙来下台的政治事件。
description.en: A series of political events in 2012 that led to the downfall of then-Politburo member Bo Xilai.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记，后被开除党籍并判刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a member of the Politburo and Party Secretary of Chongqing, later expelled from the party and imprisoned.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局由中国共产党中央委员会全体会议选举产生，在中央委员会全体会议闭会期间行使中央委员会的职权，并向其报告工作，接受监督。
description.en: The Politburo of the CPC Central Committee is elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee, exercises the powers of the Central Committee between its plenary sessions, reports its work to it, and is subject to its supervision.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会是中央政治局的常设机构。
description.en: The Politburo Standing Committee is the standing body of the Politburo.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央书记处
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处是中央政治局及其常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The Central Secretariat is the working body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第五次全国代表大会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局从1927年5月的第五次全国代表大会后的五届一中全会开始设立。
description.en: The Politburo of the CPC Central Committee was established starting from the 1st Plenary Session of the 5th Central Committee after the 5th National Congress in May 1927.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 作为中华人民共和国权力金字塔的顶端，中央政治局控制着政府（国务院）。
description.en: As the apex of the power structure in the People's Republic of China, the Politburo controls the government (State Council).

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为中华人民共和国权力金字塔的顶端，中央政治局控制着军队（中央军事委员会）。
description.en: As the apex of the power structure in the People's Republic of China, the Politburo controls the military (Central Military Commission).

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局
relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 作为中华人民共和国权力金字塔的顶端，中央政治局控制着国会（全国人民代表大会）。
description.en: As the apex of the power structure in the People's Republic of China, the Politburo controls the congress (National People's Congress).

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局委员。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 于中共二十届一中全会当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee.

中国共产党中央政治局
中国共产党中央政治局
赵紫阳

description.zh-cn: 在1989年6月的十三届四中全会上，赵紫阳因在六四事件中的表现被撤销政治局委员职务。
description.en: At the 4th Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee in June 1989, Zhao Ziyang was removed from his position as a Politburo member due to his actions during the Tiananmen Square protests.

relationships.target: 胡启立

description.zh-cn: 在1989年6月的十三届四中全会上，胡启立因在六四事件中的表现被免去政治局委员职务。
description.en: At the 4th Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee in June 1989, Hu Qili was removed from his position as a Politburo member due to his actions during the Tiananmen Square protests.

relationships.target: 彭真

description.zh-cn: “文化大革命”开始后，彭真于1966年5月被打倒，实际上丧失了政治局成员地位。
description.en: After the start of the 'Cultural Revolution', Peng Zhen was purged in May 1966, effectively losing his position as a Politburo member.

relationships.target: 薄熙来

description.zh-cn: 2012年4月，中共中央决定停止薄熙来的中央政治局委员职务。
description.en: In April 2012, the CPC Central Committee decided to suspend Bo Xilai from his position as a member of the Central Politburo.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 孙政才

description.zh-cn: 2017年9月，孙政才被开除党籍，其政治局委员职务自然撤销。
description.en: In September 2017, Sun Zhengcai was expelled from the Party, and his position as a Politburo member was automatically revoked.
